mapper.sql: id, news_id, resousel, top_time, createtime, updatetime, creater, updater, apply_status
mapper.select:
select t.id, t.news_id, t.resousel, t.top_time, t.apply_status, c.id as businesskey, c.title, c.author_id, c.company_id, comp.company_name, c.sendtime, c.content, c.news_type, u.username as author_name from news_top t left join news_content c on t.news_id = c.id left join news_user u on u.id = c.author_id left join news_company comp on comp.id = c.company_id where t.resousel = #{type} and t.apply_status = 2 order by t.top_time desc, t.id desc
limit 0, 5
limit 0, 10

select m.* from ((select t.id, t.news_id, t.resousel, t.top_time, t.apply_status, c.id as businesskey, c.title, c.author_id, c.company_id, comp.company_name, c.sendtime, c.content, c.news_type, u.username as author_name from news_top t left join news_content c on c.id = t.news_id left join news_user u on u.id = c.author_id left join news_company comp on comp.id = c.company_id where t.resousel = '0' and t.apply_status = 2 and t.top_time = (select tt.top_time from news_top tt where tt.id = #{topId}) and t.id < #{topId} order by t.top_time desc,t.id desc) union all (select t.id, t.news_id, t.resousel, t.top_time, t.apply_status, c.id as businesskey, c.title, c.author_id, c.company_id, comp.company_name, c.sendtime, c.content, c.news_type, u.username as author_name from news_top t left join news_content c on c.id = t.news_id left join news_user u on u.id = c.author_id left join news_company comp on comp.id = c.company_id where t.resousel = '0' and t.apply_status = 2 and t.top_time < (select tt.top_time from news_top tt where tt.id = #{topId}) order by t.top_time desc,t.id desc)) m order by m.top_time desc, m.id desc limit 0, 10

select t.id, t.news_id, t.resousel, t.top_time, t.apply_status, c.id as businesskey, c.title, c.author_id, c.company_id, comp.company_name, c.sendtime, c.content, c.news_type, u.username as author_name from news_top t left join news_content c on t.news_id = c.id left join news_user u on u.id = c.author_id left join news_company comp on comp.id = c.company_id where t.apply_status = 1 and t.createtime >= date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') order by t.createtime desc, t.id desc limit 0, 10

select m.* from((select t.id, t.news_id, t.resousel, t.top_time, t.apply_status,t.createtime, c.id as businesskey, c.title, c.author_id, c.company_id, comp.company_name, c.sendtime, c.content, c.news_type, u.username as author_name from news_top t left join news_content c on c.id = t.news_id left join news_user u on u.id = c.author_id left join news_company comp on comp.id = c.company_id where t.apply_status = 1 and t.createtime = (select createtime from news_top where id = #{topId}) and t.id <#{topId} order by t.createtime desc) union all (select t.id, t.news_id, t.resousel, t.top_time, t.apply_status, t.createtime, c.id as businesskey, c.title, c.author_id, c.company_id, comp.company_name, c.sendtime, c.content, c.news_type, u.username as author_name from news_top t left join news_content c on c.id = t.news_id left join news_user u on u.id = c.author_id left join news_company comp on comp.id = c.company_id where t.apply_status = 1 and t.createtime < (select createtime from news_top where id = #{topId}) order by t.createtime desc)) m order by m.createtime desc, m.id desc limit 0, 10

select t.id, t.news_id, t.resousel, t.top_time, t.apply_status, c.id as businesskey, c.title, c.author_id, c.company_id, comp.company_name, c.sendtime, c.content, c.news_type, u.username as author_name from news_top t left join news_content c on t.news_id = c.id left join news_user u on u.id = c.author_id left join news_company comp on comp.id = c.company_id where t.apply_status = #{applyStatus} order by t.top_time desc, t.id desc limit 0, 10

select m.* from((select t.id, t.news_id, t.resousel, t.top_time, t.apply_status, c.id as businesskey, c.title, c.author_id, c.company_id, comp.company_name, c.sendtime, c.content, c.news_type, u.username as author_name from news_top t left join news_content c on c.id = t.news_id left join news_user u on u.id = c.author_id left join news_company comp on comp.id = c.company_id where t.apply_status = #{applyStatus} and t.top_time = (select top_time from news_top where id = #{topId}) and t.id < #{topId} order by t.top_time desc, t.id desc) union all (select t.id, t.news_id, t.resousel, t.top_time, t.apply_status, c.id as businesskey, c.title, c.author_id, c.company_id, comp.company_name, c.sendtime, c.content, c.news_type, u.username as author_name from news_top t left join news_content c on c.id = t.news_id left join news_user u on u.id = c.author_id left join news_company comp on comp.id = c.company_id where t.apply_status = #{applyStatus} and t.top_time < (select top_time from news_top where id = #{topId}) order by t.top_time desc)) m order by m.top_time desc, m.id desc limit 0, 10
